heading.category: CDM (Click on the pie chart to see the patients included in the pie chart)
heading.name: Hypertension Prevalence
heading.definition: Proportion of active patients in the practice coded with Hypertension.
heading.notes: i) HTN patients: "Patient Status: Active AND has a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 38341003 OR starting with 401" ii) Other patients: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 38341003 OR starting with 401"

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT -- TOTAL NUMBER OF PATIENTS NOTED AS ACTIVE WITH CURRENT HYPERTENSION IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( dxresearch_code is not NULL , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "Number Active, Current Hypertension", -- TOTAL NUMBER OF PATIENTS NOTED AS ACTIVE WITHOUT CURRENT HYPERTENSION IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( dxresearch_code is NULL , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "Number Active, No Current Hypertension" FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, d.patient_status AS pt_status, dxresearch_code FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, COUNT(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (LEFT(dxresearch_code, 3) IN ('401') AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code IN ('38341003') AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) problems ON d.demographic_no = problems.demographic_no WHERE d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.patient_status = ${pstatus} AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ) fin

drillDownQuery.query: SELECT * FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN dxresearch dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no WHERE d.patient_status=${pstatus} AND ( (LEFT(dxr.dxresearch_code, 3) IN ('401') AND dxr.coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxr.dxresearch_code IN ('38341003') AND dxr.coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) AND dxr.status = 'A' AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} GROUP BY d.demographic_no ORDER BY COUNT(d.demographic_no) DESC, d.demographic_no
